title: Play Diablo 4 with foot and joystick (DirectInput to Xbox Sim)
description:
Source: https://github.com/EloiStree/2022_10_20_DirectInputSharpToBoolean
In this video I experiment the code I did the last days to track DirectInput and redirect it to an Xbox Simulator. The aim was to finish I code I started month ago. (Still draft version but you can found it on GitHub)
author: Éloi Strée, ꬲ🧰: Raw video
